headline: How the Narrative Surrounding Heidrick and Struggles Has Changed After the Fifty Nine Dollar Takeover Offer
summary: Heidrick & Struggles International has seen its fair value reiterated at $59.00 per share, with only marginal tweaks to the underlying assumptions that support the agreed all cash take private offer. While the discount rate has edged slightly lower and revenue growth expectations remain steady, analysts are increasingly framing the deal price as the reference point for the stock’s near term narrative. Read on to see how you can stay on top of these evolving market signals and keep updated on...
